WorkItem.ClosedComment: Apparently you didn't read the Posting Guidelines. If you had, you would have read that you need to search for existing issues before posting a new one.
WorkItem.Description: Longtime user of rawr, having some issues with my warlock layout. I utilize several spreadsheets including the Rawr program and i have had difficulty with getting any pet dps to show up recently (last 2 weeks) I have a spec selected, pet selected, all buffs utilized and have spell priorities listed. It will not however show me any level of pet dps (indicates 0) and it will not show fight details on click.
